Mogućnost zamjene: Nije moguća zamjena za drugu nekretninu
opis: Prodaje se samostojeća kuća u Kožinu, na vrlo atraktivnoj lokaciji, udaljena svega 40 metara od mora i plaže.Tlocrtna površina kuće iznosi 155 m2, raspoređenih na tri kata.Visoko prizemlje sastoji se od ulaznog prostora, kuhinje s ostavom, dnevnog boravka s blagovaonicom, prostranom terasom s koje se pruža pogled na more, tri spavaće sobe, od kojih jedna ima vlastitu kupaonicu s wc-om te zasebno kupaonice.Unutarnje stepenište, vodi na kat kuće koji se sastoji od ulaznog prostora, hodnika, tri spavaće sobe, svaka sa svojom terasom te kupaonicom, kuhinja s blagovaonicom te terasom orijentiranom na sjever.Kuća ima veliki prostrani podrum, tlocrtne veličine kuće, koji ima dva pristupa, s vanjske strane kuće i s unutarnje strane kuće. Podrum ima trenutnu namjenu kao vešeraj te spremište sa vlastitom kupaonicom, međutim postoji mogućnost prenamjene u teretanu, saunu, wellness te ostali sadržaj.Uz kuću se nalazi i garaža, iz koje je moguć direktan ulaz u apartmane.Kroz cijelu kuću provedeno je centralno grijanje, kotlovnica se nalazi u podrumu.Kvalitetna izgradnja, uredan krov, solarni paneli, hrastov parket, pločice, klima uređaji, pvc stolarija.Kuću okružuje okućnica od 227 m2 uređenog i održavanog vrta s roštiljem.Veliki potencijal za bavljenje turizmom ili prenamijene u manje stambene zgrade.Dokumentacija i vlasništvo uredno.Za sve ostale informacije, kontaktirajte ured.      mob;+385996991748 ***A detached house for sale in Kožino, in a very attractive location, only 40 meters from the sea and the beach.The floor plan of the house is 155 m2, spread over three floors.The upper ground floor consists of an entrance area, a kitchen with a pantry, a living room with a dining room, a spacious terrace with a view of the sea, three bedrooms, one of which has its own bathroom with a toilet and a separate bathroom.An internal staircase leads to the first floor of the house, which consists of an entrance area, a hallway, three bedrooms, each with its own terrace and bathroom, a kitchen with a dining room and a terrace oriented to the north.The house has a large, spacious basement, the floor plan size of the house, which has two accesses, from the outside of the house and from the inside of the house. The basement is currently used as a laundry room and a storage room with its own bathroom, but there is the possibility of converting it into a gym, sauna, wellness and other facilities.There is also a garage next to the house, from which you can directly enter the apartments.The whole house has central heating, the boiler room is located in the basement.Quality construction, neat roof, solar panels, oak parquet, tiles, air conditioners, PVC joinery.The house is surrounded by a 227 m2 landscaped and maintained garden with a barbecue.Great potential for tourism or conversion into smaller residential buildings. mob:+385996991748
